source_objects.title: Mobile Development
source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.

items.title: Build the original Instagram with React Native & Firebase

visible_instructors.title: Rusty Zone
visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced full stack web & mobile developer
visible_instructors.name: Rusty

items.headline: React Native User Authorisation & Database with Firebase
objectives_summary: Make an app ready to be published onto app stores
Understand how you use Firebase with React Native
Upload photos in React Native to Firebase Storage

items.title: Rapidly Build 12 iPhone/Android Augmented Reality (AR) Apps
items.headline: Build 12 AR Apps (Incl. Animated Cut Scenes) & Start Your Own App Building Business! No Coding - Latest Unity/Vuforia
objectives_summary: 1.	Create 12 Next-Gen Augmented Reality Apps for iOS/Android – Knowledge of Programming or coding is not required, a willingness to learn is all that is required
2.	At the end of the course, you should be able to create an AR app in under 10min or even 5min!

3.	Create your own AR App business by learning how to build practical Augmented Reality Apps including AR Business cards (with multiple video players), Drag/Drop AR object Apps (E.g. Furniture), AR books, AR animated cut scenes, AR greeting cards, User Defined Target AR Apps (Markeless), AR jump scare horror Apps and many more!

items.title: Android Firebase Masterclass - Master Google Firebase
items.headline: Create Cloud based Android applications using Google Firebase and expand your career options
objectives_summary: Understand the fundamentals of Firebase and all of its benefits
How to create Android Applications that use Firebase Features
Learn how to use Firebase's full drop-in Authentication Solution which includes Google Sign-in, Facebook sign-in, Twitter sign in and many more!

items.title: CoreData for Swift Development (Swift 4.2 & iOS 12)
items.headline: Master the Core Data in Swift 4.2 and iOS 12, and take your iOS development skills to the next level
objectives_summary: Deep understanding how CoreData data persistent works in iOS

items.title: Master iOS Auto Layout (Swift/Xcode)
items.headline: Master Auto Layout for Swift iOS Development with Xcode Storyboard and Programmatic approach
objectives_summary: Properly laying out UI components that will adjust to devices sizes and orientation.
Get comfortable with auto layout UI using Storyboards.
Learn auto layout programmatically

items.title: Build A Chat Application With Firebase, Flutter and Provider
items.headline: Make a complete mobile messaging application like WhatsApp or Telegram using Flutter, Firebase and Provider Framework!
objectives_summary: How to build a complete chat messaging application with Flutter and Firebase!
How to use Flutter Provider Framework

items.title: Chatbots for Multiple Platforms with No Coding

visible_instructors.title: David Winegar
visible_instructors.job_title: Helping you learn skills to make you more successful.
visible_instructors.name: David

items.headline: UPDATED Oct, 2017: Build Chatbots for Facebook, Slack, Skype, KiK, Telegram and others. No coding needed.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to create chatbots for many different platforms without writing a single line of code.
You will understand the power of chatbots in the entertainment, travel, work, and retail environment.
You will be able to develop sophisticated chatbots that use buttons and AI to create great customer experiences.

items.title: Socket.IO Chat App in React Native for iOS/Android
items.headline: Learn how to create a realtime Socket IO Chat App with React Native and Socket IO!
objectives_summary: Create a mobile app with React Native and Expo
Create a Socket IO backend in Nodejs
Create a public chatroom app with Socket IO and React Native

items.title: Intermediate Android Development and Kotlin
items.headline: Building high quality Android applications with the latest technologies, software patterns, and languages available
objectives_summary: Understand how to write a complex Android application to be scalable, readable, and modular for personal projects or a development job
Understand how Android view inflation actually works and make custom views
Understand industry programming concepts such as dependency injection and event driven programming

items.title: Build Real World Teacher Finder App with Xamarin Forms
items.headline: Learn Xamarin Forms Real World Application From Beginning to End
objectives_summary: Be able to build any app you want in xamarin forms
Work as a freelance xamarin forms developer
Create your first xamarin forms real world application

items.title: Android App Development: Mobile App Development & Java

visible_instructors.job_title: Expert in Programming, Development, Business & More!
visible_instructors.title: Easy Learn
visible_instructors.name: Easy

items.headline: Android App Development & Java Programming: Mobile App Development & Design, Build Android Apps, Android 5 & Lollipop
objectives_summary: Android Os Development
Performance Optimization And Testing
Learn Android 5 Or Lollipop

items.title: Complete iOS Bootcamp - Swift & Objective-C
items.headline: Beginner to Advanced iPhone / iPad App Development with Swift, Objective-C and Xcode.
objectives_summary: Make real-life iOS Applications using advanced and relevant technology.
Be prepared to take on any iOS development challenges on your own.
Create various iOS applications with advanced User Interfaces, graphics, and animations as well as proper backend and data persistency.

items.title: Make 5 Android Apps in 1 Hour No Coding  With App Inventor 2

visible_instructors.title: Robert Pugh
visible_instructors.job_title: Programmer, Mobile App Creator, All Around Geek
visible_instructors.name: Robert

items.headline: Learn how to use a free tool to make 5 legitimate Android Apps in only 1 hour!
objectives_summary: Use App Inventor 2 to start making your own Android Apps without coding.
Be able to build on what you learn to start making your own apps that you can sell on Google Play to make money.
Learn the basic fundamentals of App Inventor 2.

items.title: HWS Swift Coding Challenges: Real Problems - Real Solutions
items.headline: Get iOS interview ready and ace the whiteboard test - Or level up your current Swift skills (Updated to Swift 5)
objectives_summary: Increase your iOS problem solving skills by working through real world Swift coding challenges
Take the whiteboard test with confidence after completing this course and secure that iOS job

items.title: Build a Mobile App without Coding in 2 Hours
items.headline: Launch your own Mobile App in 2 hours. We will build a mobile app with Google Sheets and Glide, with no coding required.
objectives_summary: Create a data structure in Google Sheets to support a mobile app
Develop a mobile app with Glide starting from a Google Sheet and with no need of coding
Distribute, install and test the mobile app

items.title: NativeScript 101: A Quickstart to Building Mobile Apps
items.headline: A quickstart to learning how to make great looking Android and iOS apps in no time using NativeScript.
objectives_summary: Build Android and iOS applications
Know how to use NativeScript for mobile application development
